name: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
desc: Constants specifying the lighting and shading algorithm to use for rendering a material.

items.name: static let blinn: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
items.desc: Shading that incorporates ambient, diffuse, and specular properties, where specular highlights are calculated using the Blinn-Phong formula.

items.name: static let constant: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
items.desc: Uniform shading that incorporates ambient lighting only.

items.name: static let lambert: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
items.desc: Shading that incorporates ambient and diffuse properties only.

items.name: static let phong: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
items.desc: Shading that incorporates ambient, diffuse, and specular properties, where specular highlights are calculated using the Phong formula.

items.name: static let physicallyBased: SCNMaterial.LightingModel
items.desc: Shading based on a realistic abstraction of physical lights and materials.
